Riekan, Noir, and Fury scatter to avoid the shots from Kaiser; 
Devilcat just lets them bounce off his energy shield.  "Take the 
major, I'll deal with this other one myself!"  Devilcat orders.

The four of them split up and cloak, exploiting one of their 
strongest fields: the chaos and confusion of open battle.
